attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Diesel fuelled cars are by far the most efficient vehicles with far lower CO2 emissions per km.  Engines made within the last 5 years also come with diesel partical systems, which remove the soot particles created with the combustion of diesel resulting in these cars being far more environmentally friendly and less harmful to health.  Also, all frieght distribution and supermarket delivery vehicles use diesel fuel, so this tax affects our everyday costs for food, etc.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
